name: Source data for Buczynski et. al., ACS Chem Neurosci, 2025.
citation: Banghart, Matthew (2025) Source data for Buczynski et. al., ACS Chem Neurosci, 2025 (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001529/draft
description: Source data for "A Chemically Stable Photocaged Noradrenaline, Buczynski et. al., ACS Chemical Neuroscience, 2025."
studyTarget: The target of this study was to validate CNV-NA, a photocaged noradrenaline, and to use it to determine if noradrenaline receptor signaling is modulated by substance P in locus coeruleus neurons.
